text: Helen Jane Morgan (married name Grandon; 20 July 1966 â€“ 19 November 2020) was a Welsh field hockey player. She was a member of the British squad that won the bronze medal at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona. She was born in Porthcawl, Bridgend, Wales. Morgan died of cancer on 19 November 2020 at the age of 54. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Welsh sportspeople Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Great Britain
title: Helen Morgan (field hockey)
